Badges circle

Create badge with circle shape by adding .badge-circle class.

5 
<span class="badge badge-circle bg-primary">5</span>

<span class="badge badge-circle bg-primary align-middle">
    <i class="ri-check-line"></i>
</span>

Badges soft colors

Change the appearance of a badge by adding .badge-soft-* class modifiers.

Primary Dark Success Danger Warning Info 
<span class="badge badge-soft-primary">Primary</span>
<span class="badge badge-soft-dark">Dark</span>
<span class="badge badge-soft-success">Success</span>
<span class="badge badge-soft-danger">Danger</span>
<span class="badge badge-soft-warning">Warning</span>
<span class="badge badge-soft-info">Info</span>
